simpleldapauth-desc: Allows authentication against a LDAP resource
simpleldapauth-error-authentication-fail: Could not authenticate credentials against LDAP domain "$1".
Could not fetch required user info to complete LDAP login.
simpleldapauth-error-authentication-attr: Existing local user collision: please login locally and match your $1, or register a new user with matching $1.
simpleldapauth-error-authentication-map-: Existing local user collision: another LDAP user is already mapped to that local user. Please contact your system administrator.
simpleldapauth-error-configuration: LDAP configuration error, please contact your system administrator.
apihelp-ext.simpleldapauth.unlink-summar: Unlink LDAP user from MediaWiki user
apihelp-ext.simpleldapauth.unlink-extend: This API can be called to unlink the LDAP <-> MediaWiki user mapping for a given LDAP user.
